items.text: tossed up on stumps, driven through extra cover for a single
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, defended towards square leg
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length again, on the pads, worked around the corner this time
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, Mithun looks to go big down the ground but ends up dragging it towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mavuta to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, defended
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: down the track, looks to go over the top but ends up skying it towards deep extra cover, falls short of the fielder
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller on stumps, tucked away towards short fine leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: fuller and wide this time, hit firmly but cover fielder cuts it off
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, pushed towards fine leg
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: length outside off, pushed towards extra cover off the front foot
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.text: long hop and Mithun takes full advantage of that, pulls it over deep midwicket for a six with a lot of power
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, SIX runs

items.text: length ball, just outside off, defended this time by Mithun
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, no run

items.preText: Zmn: "On "unpredictable" Mirpur pitch, toss winning team should take bowling first. I don't understand why Mash opted to bat first to take unnecessary pressure on his team."
items.text: a low full toss on leg stump, Imrul looks to work it inside out, couldn't get it past the extra cover fielder
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: fuller once again, pushed back towards the bowler
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: length ball, just outside off, Imrul steers it to short third man
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: goes for the slog sweep and splits the gap in the deep, there was a backward square leg and deep midwicket in place but Imrul bisects them perfectly for a maximum. 100 comes up for Bangladesh with that six
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, SIX runs

items.text: back to back sixes, it was short, just outside off, Imrul went deep and pulled it over midwicket this time
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, SIX runs

items.text: googly on the pads, played gently towards square leg for a quick single
items.shortText: Mavuta to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.text: length ball, pushed towards long-off for a single
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, 1 run

items.preText: Ron: "Am I the only one confused about Imrul's role in the team? Enforcer or anchor? Those 2 sixes made it even more confusing..."
items.text: short and wide and Mithun cuts it past short third man, sweeper cover puts in the full-length dive to prevent a boundary
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: pitched up this time and driven towards deep extra cover for two more
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 2 runs

items.text: fuller again and driven, a fumble by the man at extra cover allows a single in the end
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Mohammad Mithun, 1 run

items.text: fuller outside off, driven, Raza makes a diving stop to his right
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: tossed up on stumps, played inside out towards extra cover
items.shortText: Sikandar Raza to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.preText:
Sean Williamson comes on.
khan: "Imrul is playing his natural game, let him play like this until 40th over. "
items.text: starts with a down the leg side wide
items.shortText: Williams to Mohammad Mithun, 1 wide
